title: Did Belusi offer to drop the charge in exchange for a full pardon for the immigrants?
subtitle: So far, the President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belusi, has not accepted the idea of trying to accuse President Donald Trump.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belusi, offered to drop the isolation proceedings against President Donald Trump in exchange for legislation granting amnesty to all undocumented immigrants in the United States.
